__e: We thought that the lover her husband was involved, but it seems she knows nothing.
I hate to say it, but we all thought he'd be dead by now anyway.
Yeah, well, we thought Max was dead too, and yet here she is, good as new.
What if the door isn't the door, or at least not the door that we thought it was?
Because I believe that her love for you has made her as good as everyone always thought she was.
It was strange telling him he may only have weeks to live when a few hours ago, we all thought he was fine.
We talked about moving, but for Earl the most important thing was to have enough for Dylan's college.
Give me the old days when you could go to mass and not think about a thing.
I'm sorry if things aren't up to snuff here but we were concentrating on important things.
